name: StartPage - Jim Can Read It!
description:
Hide top-of-page Ads.
Improved contrast, colors, and font size for folks like me that cannot read, for instance, light grey text on a lighter grey background or very small fonts.

Keywords: High Contrast, Readability, Light Theme, Lite Theme, Dark Font, Better Contrast, StartPage

user.name: Jim Dodd
user.about:
My eyesight has recently degraded, and I can no longer read some web pages. Grey text on slightly lighter or slightly darker background (aka low contrast) is a real problem for me. So are the recent use of skinny typefaces.

It has been my mission to learn HTML, CSS, and JavaScript so I can create more legible themes for websites I use a lot.

Suggestions and hints/tips are always welcome.

additional_info:
Version: 1.00    5/30/2019

Version 1.01 9/3/2019 --Fixed some StartPage web page changes
